featured.text: Many areas will also organize bon-odori dances.

definition.zh_def: 一種日本傳統舞蹈，通常伴隨著音樂和節奏進行，表達文化和社會的主題。
definition.en_def: A traditional Japanese dance often performed with music and rhythm, expressing cultural and social themes.
definition.example: The festival featured a vibrant odori that captivated everyone in attendance.
